extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by retrieving the installed version of ILC 2050 BI or ILC 2050 BI-L.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Emalytics 1.2.3 or Higher
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Engineering software to Emalytics 1.2.3 or higher and recommission the controllers.

extracted_playbook.title: Download and Verify Update
extracted_playbook.description: Download the updated version from the vendor's product page and verify the SHA-256 checksum.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is it possible to update to Emalytics 1.2.3 or higher?

extracted_playbook.title: Install the Update
extracted_playbook.description: Install the Emalytics 1.2.3 update to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Contact Phoenix Contact for Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: If updating is not possible, contact Phoenix Contact via email to obtain a fixed version.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Security Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Operate network-capable devices in closed networks or protect them with a suitable firewall. Refer to the application note for detailed security measures.
